excerpt: "Chinese dissident artist Ai Weiwei has described as almost \"medieval\" a new law in Hong Kong that criminalizes disrespecting China's national anthem. Hong Kong's legislature approved a contentious bill Thursday that makes it illegal to insult the Chinese national anthem."
